articles.description: Watch live coverage from day nine of Wimbledon featuring Aryna Sabalenka, Cameron Norrie and Carlos Alcaraz.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025 LIVE: Sabalenka vs Siegemund, Fritz vs Khachanov - watch TV stream, scores & order of play

articles.description: American number one Taylor Fritz overcomes an unexpected third-set capitulation to beat Karen Khachanov and reach the semi-finals of Wimbledon for the first time.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025 results: Taylor Fritz beats Karen Khachanov to reach semi-finals

articles.description: The Liverpool player was killed with his brother when their Lamborghini car had a suspected tyre blowout.
articles.title: Diogo Jota's car likely speeding before accident, Spanish police say

articles.description: World number one Aryna Sabalenka fights back to beat Laura Siegemund and claw her way into the Wimbledon semi-finals.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025 results: Aryna Sabalenka survives almighty scare to beat Laura Siegemund and reach semi-finals

articles.description: There was more controversy around the electronic line call system during Tuesday's quater-final action as a point in Taylor Fritz's match with Karen Khachanov had to be replayed because of a "malfunction" with the technology.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025: Point replayed after line call 'malfunction'

articles.description: Wales' Euro 2025 team bus has been involved in an accident on the way to the their pre-match press conference in St Gallen.
articles.title: Euro 2025: Wales team bus involved in accident on way to training

articles.description: Watch live streaming and follow text updates as Germany take on Denmark at Euro 2025.
articles.title: Germany vs Denmark: Women's Euro 2025 line-ups, kick-off time & updates

articles.description: Maro Itoje would welcome Owen Farrell's return to the England fold if his Saracens team-mate wants to come back into the squad.
articles.title: Maro Itoje would welcome Owen Farrell England return

articles.description: Rising English amateur Lottie Woad will be full of confidence heading into this week's Evian Championship - the fourth major of the year - after trouncing the field at the Irish Open, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: Evian Championship: English amateur Lottie Woad is 'game's most exciting emerging talent'

articles.description: Newcastle United are poised to spend their first money of the summer transfer window as they prepare for their Champions League return.
articles.title: Newcastle United agree fee for Nottingham Forest's Anthony Elanga
